Item.Name: Papernote
Item.Description: Congratulations you have been invited to the royal picnic in the tower of the princess.
Item.KeyOf: You see from a far a tower and a fontain

Item.Name: Sword
Item.Description: A simple old and rusty sword.

Item.Name: Forbidden_tree
Item.Description: A big tree that have only one apple

Item.Name: Forbidden_apple
Item.Description: Only by grabbing it you feel your senses tingle. You feel as if reality bended around it. Are those voices? O are you just dizzy?
Item.KeyOf: The guard doesn't let you pass unless you bring food. Also looks like he could overpower you easily.

Item.Name: Broken_bottle
Item.Description: A simple old and rusty sword.

Item.Name: Wardrobe
Item.Description: Has plenty of dresses, heels and armors. From all of those one shines more than any, the HQ_dress.

Item.Name: HQ_dress
Item.Description: This dress is kinda of embarrassing on you, but the stats are too good to pass on them.

Item.Name: Picture
Item.Description: Everytime you look at the princess face or the apple, your head hurt. As if you were about to remember something.

Item.Name: Mirror
Item.Description: Finally has arrived your moment. You extend your hand to the princess, and as you were about to touch her she banishes. You look at yourself in the mirror, and it's you but you are biting the apple. Your consciousness blurs, you are falling asleep. In your lasts moments awake you can see your body in the woods slept, with a note in your hand.
